ai-atk-s0510a36:2_0: The first forty-four kinds of accumulation and indicated the first, and the second without (himself), with good fortune-telling (their wealth) declarations about the profound,
ai-atk-s0510a36:3_1: Chief in the fourth town, the Khujjuttarāpa, and the Elder Nun Mahākasammaka.
ai-atk-s0510a36:3_2: Herein, a pigs’ slaughterhouse, having driven out,
ai-atk-s0510a36:3_3: droping the board, wiped their hands, and moistened on his dry land, he dropped on his tent.
ai-atk-s0510a36:3_4: So he gave me a simile of the Bhikkhu fraternity and then setting out on the ground for merit.
ai-atk-s0510a36:4_0: there were five hundred Elders of the Dragons who had mastered their attaining mastery of the garden of a single elder who was the nine Commentaries (of the First Religion), observed five Commentaries, and was the nineteenth of the Elder Nun Suttanta. The there were embracing the dyaddy of the Āsimiles, –
